com.xith3d.scenegraph
Class BoundingPolytope

java.lang.Object
  com.xith3d.spatial.bounds.ConvexHull
      com.xith3d.scenegraph.BoundingPolytope
All Implemented Interfaces:
Bounds
public class BoundingPolytope
extends ConvexHull
implements Bounds

A set of planes that prescribe a convex, closed polygonal bounding region.
